meanings.definition: Give a new name to someone or something.
meanings.sent1: She renames her cat 'Whiskers' because it suits him better.
meanings.sent2: The teacher renames the student's project to 'Creative Writing'.
meanings.sent3: He renames his alarm clock 'The Early Bird' to make waking up more fun.
meanings.sent4: The artist renames her painting 'Midnight Serenade' to evoke a sense of mystery.
meanings.sent5: The magician renames his tricks to keep the audience guessing.

meanings.definition: To change the name of someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The company renames its products to attract more customers.
meanings.sent2: In the fairy tale, the princess renames the frog 'Prince Charming'.
meanings.sent3: He renames his favorite tree 'Shady' because it provides cool shade.
meanings.sent4: The author renames her characters to add depth to the story.
meanings.sent5: The chef renames the dish to make it sound more appetizing.
